*div1 type="summary"* *p*John A. Williams to Austin, February 7, 1827. Repulse of insurgents. Francis Biggam to Austin, February 13, 1827. Disquieting reports from Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Head quarters Sprowls plantation*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="02-07-1827">7th Feby 1827*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr sir your favour of the *date_mentioned n="01-23-1827">23rd Ult*/date_mentioned*. together with the *person_mentioned*gover nor*/person_mentioned*'s procklamation has been recd.*/p*
*p*you will no dout before the reception of this have heard of the patriotic manner in which the *person_mentioned*Inhabitants */person_mentioned*have rallied in defence of their *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, and dispersed the rebellious *person_mentioned*gang of *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*. I refer you to *person_mentioned*Mr Kenney*/person_mentioned* for further information. A quantity of property found in possession of the *person_mentioned*enimy */person_mentioned*has fal[len] into our possessin I have to request that some *person_mentioned*person */person_mentioned*duly authorized be immediately sent on to take charge thereof, or dispose of it as the *person_mentioned*government */person_mentioned*may direct, yesterday we detached fifty *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned*for *date_mentioned n="02-13-1827">7 day service*/date_mentioned* which will remain stationed at this place untill the expiration of that time.*/p*
*p*Permit me to suggest the propriety of continuing a sufficient *person_mentioned*Military force*/person_mentioned* at this place for some time lest a remisness on our part might induce the disaffected to commit new outrages upon the *person_mentioned*inhabitants of another class */person_mentioned*who have already suffered enough.*/p*
*p*A great deale has been done by the faithful *person_mentioned*subject */person_mentioned*in this section of *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, but yet the work is far from being compleat*/p*
*p*We shall employ every means in our power to sustain the government, and restore tranquility*/p*.
*p**person_mentioned*Jno. A. Williams */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
